basics.name: Tyler Kahmann
basics.label: Shidler Undergraduate
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.B.A. in Finance, Management Information Systems, and International Business in the Shidler College of Business at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2025.

work.summary: Assisted in the clinic's daily operations

awards.title: Merit Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.8 at a Hawai'i public school.
